problem_names:
lemma (in v11) v11_veqpollI[intro]:
  assumes "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> r = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> r = B"
  shows "A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

lemma v11_veqpollE[elim]: 
  assumes "A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B" 
  obtains f where "v11 f" and "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f = B"

lemma veqpoll_vinsert:
  assumes "A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B" and "a \<notin>\<^sub>\<circ> A" and "b \<notin>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
  shows "vinsert a A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> vinsert b B"

lemma veqpoll_pair: 
  assumes "a \<noteq> b" and "c \<noteq> d"
  shows "set {a, b} \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> set {c, d}"

lemma veqpoll_vpair: 
  assumes "a \<noteq> b" and "c \<noteq> d"
  shows "\<langle>a, b\<rangle> \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> \<langle>c, d\<rangle>"

lemma vlepoll_vsubset: 
  assumes "A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
  shows "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

lemma vlesspollE[elim]:
  assumes "A \<prec>\<^sub>\<circ> B" and "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<Longrightarrow> ~(A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B) \<Longrightarrow> P"
  shows P

lemma (in v11) v11_vlepollI[intro]: 
  assumes "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> r = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> r \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
  shows "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

lemma v11_vlepollE[elim]: 
  assumes "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B" 
  obtains f where "v11 f" and "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
translations:
lemma (in v11) v11_veqpollI[intro]:
  assumes "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> r = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> r = B"
  shows "A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>f. bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. inj_on (app r) (elts A)
 2. app r ` elts A = elts B

proof (state)
this:
  inj_on (app r) (elts A)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. app r ` elts A = elts B
show "app r ` elts A = elts B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. app r ` elts A = elts B

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. app r ` elts (\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> r) = elts (\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> r)

proof (state)
this:
  app r ` elts A = elts B

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma v11_veqpollE[elim]: 
  assumes "A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B" 
  obtains f where "v11 f" and "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f = B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f = B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f = B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
obtain f where bij_f: "bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B) \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>f. bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B) \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f = B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (chain)
picking this:
  bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B)

have "v11 (\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A. f a)" 
    and "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A. f a) = A" 
    and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A. f a) = B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  bij_betw f (elts A) (elts B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v11 (VLambda A f) &&&
    \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A &&&
    \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = B

proof (state)
this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f = B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (chain)
picking this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = B

proof (prove)
using this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = B
  \<lbrakk>v11 ?f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> ?f = A;
   \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> ?f = B\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis

proof (state)
this:
  thesis

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma veqpoll_vinsert:
  assumes "A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B" and "a \<notin>\<^sub>\<circ> A" and "b \<notin>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
  shows "vinsert a A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> vinsert b B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vinsert a A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> vinsert b B

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B
  a \<notin>\<^sub>\<circ> A
  b \<notin>\<^sub>\<circ> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vinsert a A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> vinsert b B

lemma veqpoll_pair: 
  assumes "a \<noteq> b" and "c \<noteq> d"
  shows "set {a, b} \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> set {c, d}"

lemma veqpoll_vpair: 
  assumes "a \<noteq> b" and "c \<noteq> d"
  shows "\<langle>a, b\<rangle> \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> \<langle>c, d\<rangle>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<noteq> b
  c \<noteq> d

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<langle>a, b\<rangle> \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> \<langle>c, d\<rangle>

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<noteq> b
  c \<noteq> d

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set {set {a}, set {a, b}} \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ>
    set {set {c}, set {c, d}}

abbreviation vlepoll :: "V \<Rightarrow> V \<Rightarrow> bool" (infixl "\<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ>" 50) 
  where "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<equiv> elts A \<lesssim> elts B"

lemma vlepoll_vsubset: 
  assumes "A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
  shows "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set {x} \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> vinsert y A

abbreviation vlesspoll :: "V \<Rightarrow> V \<Rightarrow> bool" (infixl \<open>\<prec>\<^sub>\<circ>\<close> 50)
  where "A \<prec>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<equiv> elts A \<prec> elts B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (A \<prec>\<^sub>\<circ> B) =
    (A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<and> \<not> A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B)

lemma vlesspollE[elim]:
  assumes "A \<prec>\<^sub>\<circ> B" and "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<Longrightarrow> ~(A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B) \<Longrightarrow> P"
  shows P

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<prec>\<^sub>\<circ> B
  \<lbrakk>A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B;
   \<not> A \<approx>\<^sub>\<circ> B\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P

lemma (in v11) v11_vlepollI[intro]: 
  assumes "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> r = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> r \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"
  shows "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>f. inj_on f (elts A) \<and> f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. inj_on (app r) (elts A)
 2. app r ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on (app r) (elts A)

proof (state)
this:
  inj_on (app r) (elts A)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. app r ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B
show "app r ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. app r ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B
by (intro subsetI) (metis assms(1,2) imageE rev_vsubsetD vdomain_atD)

proof (state)
this:
  app r ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma v11_vlepollE[elim]: 
  assumes "A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B" 
  obtains f where "v11 f" and "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
obtain f where "inj_on f (elts A)" and "f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<lesssim>\<^sub>\<circ> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>inj_on f (elts A); f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>f. inj_on f (elts A) \<and> f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>inj_on f (elts A); f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  inj_on f (elts A)
  f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (chain)
picking this:
  inj_on f (elts A)
  f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

have "v11 (\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A. f a)" 
    and "\<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A. f a) = A" 
    and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A. f a) \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  inj_on f (elts A)
  f ` elts A \<subseteq> elts B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v11 (VLambda A f) &&&
    \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A &&&
    \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B

proof (state)
this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>v11 f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> f = A;
         \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (chain)
picking this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B

proof (prove)
using this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  v11 (VLambda A f)
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) = A
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (VLambda A f) \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B
  \<lbrakk>v11 ?f; \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> ?f = A;
   \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> ?f \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> B\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis

proof (state)
this:
  thesis

goal:
No subgoals!
